title: E
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''e''' brings up the equip menu, allowing you to put on [[weapon]]s, [[armour]], and [[jewellery]].
*Pressing '''E''' prints your game status.
*Pressing '''Ctrl-E''' allows you to create [[Macro]]s.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''e''' represents an [[List of deep elves|elf]]-type monster.
*'''E''' represents an [[Summon Elemental|elemental]]-type monster.

==History==
*In [[0.30]], the '''e'''quip command was added.
*Prior to [[0.27]], pressing '''Ctrl-E''' would set your travel speed to your slowest ally. (This was moved to '''Ctrl-[[T]]'''.)
*Prior to [[0.26]], pressing '''e''' would bring up the [[eat]] menu.
*The '''Ctrl-E''' command was added in [[0.13]].
